# VMX_REASON_PML_FULL | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Hypervisor ](/documentation/hypervisor)

- [ VMX_REASON_PML_FULL ](/documentation/Hypervisor/VMX_REASON_PML_FULL)

-  VMX_REASON_PML_FULL 

Global Variable# VMX_REASON_PML_FULL

macOS

```
var VMX_REASON_PML_FULL: Int { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Hypervisor/VMX_REASON_PML_FULL#see-also)

### [Exit reasons](/documentation/Hypervisor/VMX_REASON_PML_FULL#Exit-reasons)

[`var VMX_REASON_EXC_NMI: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_exc_nmi)VMX exit due to an exception or non-maskable interrupt (NMI).[`var VMX_REASON_IRQ: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_irq)An external interrupt arrived and the “external-interrupt exiting” VM-execution control was 1.[`var VMX_REASON_TRIPLE_FAULT: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_triple_fault)VMX exit due to a triple fault.[`var VMX_REASON_INIT: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_init)VMX exit due to an INIT signal.[`var VMX_REASON_SIPI: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_sipi)VMS exit due to startup (IPI).[`var VMX_REASON_IO_SMI: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_io_smi)VMX exited due to an I/O SMM Interrupt.[`var VMX_REASON_OTHER_SMI: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_other_smi)An SMI arrived and caused an SMM VM exit.[`var VMX_REASON_IRQ_WND: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_irq_wnd)VMX exited due to an Interrupt Window.[`var VMX_REASON_VIRTUAL_NMI_WND: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_virtual_nmi_wnd)At the beginning of an instruction, there was no virtual-NMI blocking.[`var VMX_REASON_TASK: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_task)The guest attempted a task switch.[`var VMX_REASON_CPUID: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_cpuid)The guest software attempted to execute the CPUID instruction.[`var VMX_REASON_GETSEC: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_getsec)The guest attempted to execute GETSEC instruction.[`var VMX_REASON_HLT: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_hlt)The guest attempted to execute HLT and the “HLT exiting” VM-execution control was 1.[`var VMX_REASON_INVD: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_invd)The guest attempted to execute Invalidate Caches (INVD) instruction.[`var VMX_REASON_INVLPG: Int`](/documentation/hypervisor/vmx_reason_invlpg)The guest attempted to execute the Invalidate TLB Entry (INVLPG) instruction and the “INVLPG exiting” VM-execution control was 1.
